message.comment: First Half Extra Time ends, Netherlands 0, Costa Rica 0.
Foul by Dirk Kuyt (Netherlands).
Johnny Acosta (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Georginio Wijnaldum (Netherlands) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Arjen Robben (Netherlands) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Hand ball by Júnior Díaz (Costa Rica).
Attempt blocked. Arjen Robben (Netherlands) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dirk Kuyt.
Attempt blocked. Arjen Robben (Netherlands) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Georginio Wijnaldum.
Offside, Netherlands. Daley Blind tries a through ball, but Robin van Persie is caught offside.
Substitution, Costa Rica. José Cubero replaces Yeltsin Tejeda.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Keylor Navas (Costa Rica) because of an injury.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Johnny Acosta.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Keylor Navas.
Attempt saved. Ron Vlaar (Netherlands) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Arjen Robben with a cross.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Johnny Acosta.
Offside, Netherlands. Stefan de Vrij tries a through ball, but Arjen Robben is caught offside.
First Half Extra Time begins Netherlands 0, Costa Rica 0.
Second Half ends, Netherlands 0, Costa Rica 0.
Offside, Netherlands. Wesley Sneijder tries a through ball, but Arjen Robben is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Robin van Persie (Netherlands) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Robin van Persie (Netherlands) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is saved in the top right corner.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Júnior Díaz (Costa Rica).
Offside, Netherlands. Daley Blind tries a through ball, but Jeremain Lens is caught offside.
Offside, Netherlands. Wesley Sneijder tries a through ball, but Jeremain Lens is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Robin van Persie (Netherlands) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica).
Wesley Sneijder (Netherlands) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica).
Offside, Netherlands. Dirk Kuyt tries a through ball, but Jeremain Lens is caught offside.
Substitution, Costa Rica. David Myrie replaces Cristian Gamboa because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) because of an injury.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Michael Umaña.
Substitution, Netherlands. Jeremain Lens replaces Memphis Depay.
Attempt missed. Ron Vlaar (Netherlands) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Wesley Sneijder with a cross following a set piece situation.
Daley Blind (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Dangerous play by Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) because of an injury.
Offside, Netherlands. Dirk Kuyt tries a through ball, but Robin van Persie is caught offside.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Yeltsin Tejeda.
Substitution, Costa Rica. Marcos Ureña replaces Joel Campbell.

Attempt missed. Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Christian Bolaños with a cross following a set piece situation.
Bruno Martins Indi (Netherlands) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Bruno Martins Indi (Netherlands).
Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) wins a free kick on the right wing.
